biotools.summary: Tool for simulating the full spectrum of genomic variants (SNPs, INDELs, CNVs, inversions, and translocations). In addition, simuG enables a rich array of fine-tuned controls, such as simulating SNPs in different coding partitions (e.g. coding sites, noncoding sites, 4-fold degenerate sites, or 2-fold degenerate sites); simulating CNVs with different formation mechanisms (e.g. segmental deletions, dispersed duplications, and tandem duplications); and simulating inversions and translocations with specific types of breakpoints.

bioschemas.name: simuG
